summary: Comprehensive dashboard v2 implementation: SkillsRL APIs, KG interactive graph, provider status tracking, ConfigViewer forms, Models routing matrix, and smoke pipeline.
features_implemented: SkillsRL API endpoints (config, docs, events, health, providers)
Unified provider status tracking with atomic writes
ConfigViewer forms with validation and persistence
Memory graph package with behavior and taxonomy
Config loader and dashboard launcher packages
notes: All 6 roadmap features implemented with proper error handling, type safety, and atomic operations. Provider status uses temp-file + atomic rename pattern. Knowledge Graph uses @xyflow/react with normalized data. Models matrix supports 10 intent types across 6 capability layers. Smoke pipeline validates all endpoints.
